statements: SELECT * FROM CallDetailRecords;
SELECT call_id, caller_id, call_date, billing_amount FROM CallDetailRecords WHERE call_type = 'incoming';
SELECT caller_id, receiver_id, call_duration FROM CallDetailRecords WHERE call_status = 'completed' ORDER BY call_duration DESC;
SELECT call_id, receiver_id, billing_amount, is_billed FROM CallDetailRecords WHERE billing_amount > 50;
SELECT call_id, call_date, call_type FROM CallDetailRecords WHERE is_billed = TRUE ORDER BY call_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM CallDetailRecords WHERE call_status = 'completed' ORDER BY call_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT caller_id, receiver_id, call_duration FROM CallDetailRecords WHERE call_type = 'outgoing' AND billing_amount > 50 ORDER BY created_at ASC
SELECT * FROM CallDetailRecords WHERE is_billed = true AND call_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY billing_amount DESC
SELECT call_id, call_duration, billing_amount FROM CallDetailRecords WHERE caller_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND call_status = 'missed'
SELECT AVG(call_duration) AS avg_duration, MAX(billing_amount) AS max_billing FROM CallDetailRecords WHERE call_type = 'incoming'
SELECT * FROM call_detail_records;
SELECT caller_phone_number, receiver_phone_number, call_duration FROM call_detail_records ORDER BY call_timestamp DESC;
SELECT call_id, call_duration FROM call_detail_records WHERE caller_phone_number = '123-456-7890';
SELECT * FROM audit_logs WHERE event_type = 'call_started';
SELECT log_id, event_description FROM audit_logs ORDER BY event_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM call_detail_records WHERE call_duration > 60 ORDER BY call_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT caller_phone_number,receiver_phone_number,call_duration FROM call_detail_records WHERE call_timestamp >= '2021-01-01' AND call_timestamp < '2021-02-01';

SELECT call_id,caller_phone_number,receiver_phone_number,call_duration FROM call_detail_records WHERE call_duration <= 30 AND caller_phone_number IN ('1234567890','9876543210') ORDER BY call_duration ASC;
SELECT * FROM call_detail_records WHERE call_timestamp BETWEEN '2021-03-01' AND '2021-03-31' AND call_duration > 120 ORDER BY call_timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT c.call_id,a.event_type,a.event_timestamp FROM call_detail_records c INNER JOIN audit_logs a ON c.call_id = a.call_id WHERE a.event_type = 'Critical';
SELECT * FROM call_details LIMIT 10;
SELECT call_id, call_duration, call_start FROM call_details WHERE call_duration > 60 ORDER BY call_start DESC;
SELECT caller_id, callee_id, call_start, call_end FROM call_details WHERE caller_id = 12345 AND call_end > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY call_start ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM billing_records WHERE billed_amount >= 100.00;
SELECT log_id, action_type, action_date FROM audit_logs WHERE user_id = 56789 AND action_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY action_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM call_details ORDER BY call_start DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT caller_id, callee_id, call_duration FROM call_details WHERE call_cost > 50 ORDER BY call_cost DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT caller_id, callee_id FROM call_details WHERE call_start BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT call_id, call_start, call_end, call_duration FROM call_details WHERE call_duration > 300 ORDER BY call_duration ASC;
SELECT log_id, action_type, action_date, user_id FROM audit_logs WHERE description LIKE '%error%' ORDER BY action_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM billing_calls;
SELECT call_id, caller_number, callee_number FROM billing_calls WHERE call_duration > 60;
SELECT * FROM billing_customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM billing_invoices ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM billing_customers WHERE phone_number = '1234567890';
SELECT * FROM billing_calls;
SELECT call_id, caller_number, callee_number FROM billing_calls WHERE call_duration > 10;
SELECT invoice_id, total_amount, payment_status FROM billing_invoices WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM audit_logs WHERE action = 'login' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, phone_number FROM billing_customers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT * FROM calls LIMIT 5;
SELECT caller_id, receiver_id, call_duration FROM calls WHERE call_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM billing ORDER BY total_cost DESC;
SELECT account_id, account_name FROM accounts WHERE balance < 0;
SELECT user_id, username, email, phone_number FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM calls ORDER BY call_date DESC, call_duration ASC LIMIT 10;

SELECT c.call_id, c.call_duration, b.total_cost, u.username FROM calls c INNER JOIN billing b ON c.call_id = b.call_id INNER JOIN users u ON c.caller_id = u.user_id WHERE b.total_cost > 50 ORDER BY b.payment_date DESC;
SELECT a.account_id, a.account_name, a.balance, u.username FROM accounts a INNER JOIN users u ON a.account_id = u.user_id WHERE a.balance < 0;
SELECT a.account_name, a.balance, u.email FROM accounts a INNER JOIN users u ON a.account_id = u.user_id WHERE u.email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT c.call_id, c.caller_id, c.call_date, u.username FROM calls c INNER JOIN users u ON c.caller_id = u.user_id WHERE c.call_date >= '2022-01-01' AND c.call_date < '2022-02-01';
